channel.description: Recent content in Local Food on Business Directory

item.title: Mechelle's Catering
item.description:
About Us

Mechelle’s Catering specializes in small-scale catering services, offering a delightful selection of freshly baked breads, cakes, and rich cheesecakes. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized service, we create memorable culinary experiences for any occasion.

Our Services

  • Small-Scale Catering: Personalized catering services for intimate gatherings
  • Fresh Breads: Daily selection of freshly baked artisanal breads
  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully crafted cakes for special occasions
  • Cheesecakes: Rich and creamy signature cheesecakes

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Mechelle Joseph
  • Phone: 773-8771
  • Email: mechellejoseph283@hotmail.com

item.title: Venissa's Catering & Authentic Foods Services
item.description:
About Us

Venissa’s Catering offers a delightful array of authentic dishes, featuring local home-ground curry, pepper sauce, Anchar, kuchela, and East Indian sweets. With a focus on traditional flavors and quality ingredients, we bring the taste of home to your events.

Our Services

  • Authentic Dishes: Traditional local cuisine prepared with authentic recipes
  • Home Ground Curry: Fresh, locally ground curry for authentic flavor
  • Traditional Condiments: Homemade pepper sauce, Anchar, and kuchela
  • East Indian Sweets: Traditional East Indian desserts and sweets

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Vanessa Ramjattan
  • Phone: 353-5431
  • Email: venissa.cateringservices@gmail.com

item.title: Shar's Shark Attack
item.description:
About Us

Shar’s Shark Attack specializes in a delectable array of seafood dishes, including shark, carite, and fillet salmon, served with your choice of bake or fries. Additionally, we offer mouthwatering wings, pastelle, ponche a crème, sweetbread, and festive Christmas fruit cakes, making it a perfect spot for seafood lovers and holiday treats.

Our Menu

Seafood Selection

  • Shark & Bake/Fries: Fresh shark served with your choice of sides
  • Carite & Bake/Fries: Delicious carite fish preparation
  • Fillet Salmon & Bake/Fries: Premium salmon fillet
  • Wings: Flavorful chicken wings

Holiday Specialties

  • Pastelle: Traditional holiday favorite
  • Ponche a Crème: Classic festive beverage
  • Sweetbread: Homemade specialty
  • Christmas Fruit Cakes: Festive holiday cakes

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Sharon James
  • Phone: +1 868 766 6782
  • Email: sharonjames6782@gmail.com

Business Hours

Monday - Saturday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM Sunday: By Appointment
